thread.title: BRIEF-TDS Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $2.54

title: BRIEF-TDS Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $2.54
text: 10 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-TDS Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $2.54 Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - Telephone And Data Systems Inc: * TDS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $1.308 BILLION * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.54 * QTRLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05‍​ * SEES 2018 TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $5,015-$5,265 MILLION * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $1,075 MILLION TO $1,255 MILLION * SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $795-$845 MILLION * TELEPHONE AND DATA SYSTEMS - IN QUARTER RECEIVED $327 MILLION ‍BENEFIT DUE TO ENACTMENT OF NEW TAX LEGISLATION, INCURRED $262 MILLION​ GOODWILL IMPAIRMENT LOSS Source text for Eikon:
